

## TIPPLER


***


Finding a bar near you just got a lot easier! </br>
Bars are seen as a social venue, and function as a social center for a local community </br>
— a place to meet friends and form networks, while fostering community spirit.</br>
Get the location of the Bar/Launge/Pub right around the corner.. </br>
Tippler is a RStudio-Shiny App desinged uniquely to locate the nearest bars within 2 Km from you!

## *Features

![](images/yelp.png)

Yelp, the “best way to find local businesses,” </br>
Gain easy access to search results and local business information from over 50 million businesses in 27 countries. </br>

By using the Yelp API you’ll be able to:

* Find up to 40 best results for a geographically-oriented search
* Sort results by the best match for the query, highest ratings, or distance
* Limit results to those businesses offering a Yelp Deal, and display information about the deal like the title, savings, and purchase URL
* Identify and display whether a business has been claimed on Yelp.com

![](images/leaflet.png)

Leaflet is one of the most popular open-source JavaScript libraries for interactive maps.</br> It’s used by websites ranging from The New York Times and The Washington Post to GitHub and Flickr, as well as GIS specialists like OpenStreetMap, Mapbox, and CartoDB.This R package makes it easy to integrate and control Leaflet maps in R.
